name: Site Structure Visualizer
author: Shubham Shinde (froosty)

sections.description: SSVP can be used for visualizing site structure in graphial format. Helps displaying custom post types,taxonomies and terms in hierarchical format.
sections.installation:
1.Just download plugin > Upload plugin > Upload/Install plugin > Activate
2.Go to Plugin Setting Page for available options.
sections.faq:
1. Do we collect your information ?
    No, Not at all. We do not collect your information.

  2. Is SSVP free for lifetime?
    Yes, it (List and Tree) view will be always free for life time, other complex premium structures may be launched in future.

  3. Which pages will be affected by SSVP plugin?
    No other pages will be affected by the use of SSVP plugin.
sections.changelog:
2.0.0 – 2023-07-28

  • Fixed – Fixed issue where tree view data was not rendering.
  • Improvement – Improved List View and Tree View Structures.
  • New – Enable and disable inbuild & custom post type data.
  • Feedback – Open for feedbacks.

1.0.0

  • Initial release

upgrade_notice: SSVP is free forever, so no need to upgrade.
